LanguageData.RE_Thought_PyjakNuzzle.stages.0.label: Nuzzled by Pyjak
LanguageData.RE_Thought_PyjakNuzzle.stages.0.descript: Take this disgusting rodent away from me.
LanguageData.RE_EezoDrone.stages.0.label: eezo psychic drone
LanguageData.RE_EezoDrone.stages.0.description: I feel like someone is always just out of sight, speaking to me. The voice changes but the message doesn't. I'm supposed to hurt people. Make it go away!
